column2: "Nna ɔman no na hɔn yernom mu nkekamu kɛse soɛree tsiaa hɔn nuanom Judafo no."
"Na binom wɔ hɔ a wɔsee dɛ
"Binom so wɔ hɔ a wɔsee dɛ
column5: na hɛn adan risisi nhoba: wɔmma yɛnhwehwɛ eburow osian ɔkɔm no ntsi."

column2: "Binom so wɔ hɔ a wɔsee dɛ
column3: Yɛafemfɛm sika dze eyi ɔhen no tow
column4: wɔ hɛn nhaban na hɛn wenyin nture no do."

column2: "Naaso afei hɛn honam tse dɛ hɛn nuanom honam
column3: hɛn mba tse dɛ hɔn mba: na
column5: yɛdze hɛn mbabanyin na hɛn mbabaa reba ɔsom mu dɛ wɔnyɛ asomfo
column6: na hɛn mbabaa mu binom wɔ hɔ a wɔahɛn nkowaasom mu dada: nkyii so ahoɔdzen bi nnyi hɛn afamu a yɛdze bɛyɛ hwee: osiandɛ hɛn nhaban na hɛn wenyin nture wowɔ binom nsamu."

column2: "Na aber a metsee hɔn nkekamu na nsɛm yi no
"Nna mara mutuu me tsir mu egyina
column3: na menye ekunyin na mpanyimfo no hamee
column6: obiara wɔ no nua hɔ. Na mobɔɔ hɔn do ngua kɛse."

column4: dɛ mbrɛ hɛn tum tse no na yɛdze apon hɛn nuanom Judafo a wɔtɔɔn hɔn maa amanamamfo no; na hom so hom pɛ dɛ wɔtontɔn hom nuanom
column5: na wɔntontɔn hɔn ma hɛn anaa? Nna wɔyɛɛ komm
column6: na woennya asɛm biara ammfa emmbua."

column3: Adze a hom reyɛ yi onnye: ana ɔnnsɛ dɛ hom nantsew hom Nyankopɔn no suro mu
column4: osian hɛn atamfo amanamamfo enyimtsiabu no ntsi bi a?"
yɛfemfɛm hɔn sika na eburow gye nsiho
column6: wɔmma yengyaa nsiho yi ekyir dzi."

column11: na ngo mu ɔha mu ebupɛn no a hom si akaperɛ gyegye no wɔ hɔn hɔ no."

column4: na yɛnnkɔhwehwɛ hɔn hɔ hwee; dɛmara na yɛbɛyɛ
column5: dɛ mbrɛ ereka no ara. Nna mefrɛɛ asɔfo no
column7: dɛ wɔbɛyɛ dɛ mbrɛ anohoba yi tse."

column4: Dɛmara na Nyankopɔn mpopo nyimpa biara a ɔmma anohoba yi nntsim no mfi ne fi
column5: na n’edwuma mu; mekyerɛ mbrɛ wobesi apopo no
column6: na wɔato no pan nye yi. Na mboanofo no nyinara see dɛ
column8: na woyii EWURADZE ayɛw. Na ɔman no yɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ anohoba yi tse."

column2: "Nkyii so ofi ber a wɔdze me sii hɔn ambrado wɔ Juda asaase do no
column3: ofi ɔhen Artasɛkeses n’afe a otsia eduonu do araa dze kodu afe a otsia eduasa ebien do no
column6: emi na mo nuanom yenndzii ambrado edziban."

column2: "Na kan no ambradofo a wodzii m’enyim no wɔyɛɛ adzesoa dze maa ɔman no
column3: na wɔgyee hɔn hɔ edziban na nsa
column4: ɔsor dwetɛ dwetɛbona eduanan so; nyew
column5: hɔn nkowaa mpo so hoom ɔman no do: naaso emi dze

column3: fasu yi ho edwuma no so mowɔɔw do ara suoo mu
column4: nkyii so yɛanntɔ asaase biara: na mo nkowaa nyinara ano boae wɔ edwuma no ho hɔ."

column2: "Nkyii so Judafo na mpanyimfo no mu nyimpa ɔha eduonum ka hɔn a wofifi amanamamfo a wɔabɔ hɛn ho aprɔw no mu ba hɛn nkyɛn no ho
"Afei dza wosiesiei dze maa da kor nye ɔnantwi kor na nguan a wɔasan mu eyiyi esia; eso ntumbowa na wosiesiei maa me
column3: na dadu biara mu nsa ahorow nyinara pii: naaso iyi nyinara mu memmbisa ambrado edziban
column4: osiandɛ nkowaasom no yɛɛ durdur wɔ ɔman yi do."

column5: kaa dza osian ɔman yi ntsi mayɛ no nyinara fa ma me wɔ me yieyɛ ntsi."
